channel.title: Simpsons on Jim's Blog

item.title: How Frequently Do The Simpsons Repeat Couch Gags?
item.author: jamesfelps@gmail.com (Jim Felps)
item.description: While trying to figure out what content to include on this site, I decided it might be best to start re-creating visualizations found online. I looked through the subreddit /r/dataisbeautiful to find a visualization, and specifically one done in a language other than R, that I found appealing and the subject matter interesting. I look at this subreddit a few times each month and love the work that people post. I like that this subreddit contains visualizations from people that have been perfecting their craft for years and people just starting out.
